00027 require_once 'zimbraConfig.php';
00045 class zlog{
00046           public static $debugLog='';
00047 
00048           public function log($log, $params='',$file='zimbraLog.txt'){
00049                     if($params!=''){
00050                         ob_start();
00051                         echo "<pre>";
00052                         echo "$log\n";
00053                         print_r($params);
00054                         echo "</pre>";
00055                         $log=ob_get_clean();
00056                     }
00057 
00058                     $f="--------------- ".date('d.m.Y H:i')."---------------\n\n".$log."\n";
00059 
00060                     zlog::addToLogFile($file,$log);
00061                     
00062                     
00063           }
00064           
00065           public function soapErrLog($log, $params=''){
00066                     
00067               zlog::log($log,$params,'SOAPErr.txt');
00068           }
00069 
00070           public function shelllog($errlog,$cmdlog){
00071 
00072                     $errlog="errlog\n$errlog\n";
00073                     $cmdlog="errlog\n$errlog\n";
00074 
00075                     zlog::addToLogFile('shelllogCMD.txt',$errlog);
00076                     zlog::addToLogFile('shelllogErr.txt',$cmdlog);
00077 
00078           }
00079 
00087           public function debugLog($msg, $log){
00088 
00089                     ob_start();
00090                     echo "<pre>";
00091                     echo "$msg\n";
00092                     print_r($log);
00093                     echo "</pre>";
00094                     $f=ob_get_clean();
00095 
00096                     $f="--------------- ".date('d.m.Y H:i')."---------------\n\n".$f."\n";
00097                     zlog::$debugLog=zlog::$debugLog.$f;
00098 
00099                     echo $f;
00100           }
00101 
00102           function hardError($log, $params){
00103               zlog::log($log,$params,'SOAPErr.txt');
00104               echo "Hard Failure. Check LogFiles. ID:";
00105               exit;
00106           }
00107           function addToLogFile($file,$log){
00108                     if(zimbraConfig::debug){
00109                               echo "<pre>".$file."\n".$log."</pre>";
00110                     }else{
00111                               $file=dirname(__FILE__).'../log/'.$file;
00112                               
00113                               if(file_exists($file)){
00114                                         $f=file_get_contents($file);
00115                               }
00116 
00117                               $f="--------------- ".date('d.m.Y H:i')."---------------\n\n".$log."\n".$f;
00118                               file_put_contents($file,$f);
00119                     }
00120           }
00121 }
